name: Miriel's Enchanted Mystery
summary:
Miriel is a young, hardworking and earnest woman with the gift of magic. Find out the story behind a mysterious egg artifact and journey through four unique locations in this time management gem! 
 
Bake bread and cakes, make potions and colored cloth, and many other exciting products. Use powerful spells to complete your tasks and buy more products and skills from the shop. Miriel's Enchanted Mystery is bristling with entertaining choices! 
 
- Enjoy hours of captivating time management entertainment 
- Experience a charming story and bite-sized hidden object puzzle challenges 
- Complete quests and upgrade your store to serve increasingly demanding customers
